definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[עגל]] (√ of foll.; cf. NH [[עָגַל]] Niph. berounded; Pi. roll a thing, etc.; Aram. Pa. 9agel roll a thing, and deriv.; Targum [[עֲגוּלָא]] rolled cake, [[עֲגִילָא]] shield, [[בַּעֲגׇלָא]], Syr. ba9gal in swiftnees, swiftly; Ar. 9ajila hasten, be swift, cf. Lag:BN 31, 143).
